name: ai-document-reader
description: AI-powered document reader with summarization and audio output

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client" "npm run ai-service"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:server" "npm run start:client" "npm run start:ai"
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server && npm run build:ai
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../ai-service && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/dist && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf frontend/node_modules
